Necross/ Splattercannon/ Malice:

Necross was shaken to the core of his being.  He fell to his hands 
and knees and bowed til his head rested on the floor.
"Of course not, Master!  I did not mean to offend you!"
Splattercannon stood simply, as dumb as ever.

Or so it appeared.

"Malice," the larger male said,"I apologize for our brother's mis 
givings.  Please do not take offense."
Malice, to be quite honest, was shocked.  He figured Splattercannon 
to be just a big dumb brute.  Perhaps there was more to the big 
Minion.
